data.title: Anti-Flag signs to RCA Records
data.meta_description: Anti-Flag has signed to RCA Records. The band is planning to record this summer for an early 2006 release. The band is working with Matt Marshall, the A&R representative who signed Modest Mouse.  The news has been confirmed by members of the band and they plan to have a statement on their website ...
data.text:
Anti-Flag has signed to RCA Records. The band is planning to record this summer for an early 2006 release. The band is working with Matt Marshall, the A&R representative who signed Modest Mouse.

The news has been confirmed by members of the band and they plan to have a statement on their website shortly.
